name: The Nope Experiment
description:
VR Escape Room Experience  -  You are stuck in a strange room where things seem familiar but aren't quite right.  Can you escape?  Nope.

Currently in Prototype stage, most of the assets are temporary but the entire "puzzle" is playable in virtual reality.

Started development at the beginning of July

Working to make a robust adventure game system and using this as a simple starting point.

I plan to add some better sound and some narration.

INSTRUCTIONS:

1. Download and Unzip

2. Run the exe file.  Make sure your VR headset is connected before you run the .exe

Note:  I haven't set up a menu... so in order to restart, you'll need to exit out and rerun the .exe
